name: Apalis
description:
My #ldjam entry for the 36th edition which theme was Ancient Technology.

Description

You find yourself among a jungle that seems to behold an ancient technology left by locals centuries ago. Stones of pure darkness bewitchedly carved by the azure alchemy of the ancient God Apalis. Explore the jungle and find out what this technology is capable of through 20 levels each tougher than the previous one.

Controls (Gamepad recommended)ActionGamepadKeyboardMoveD-padQD/AD or Arrow keysJumpAZ/W, Space or Up arrowCredits

Code and Art by Tselmek (@tselmek)

Art by Newan (thomasdelaporte.net)

Audio by Carlos Pazuzu (soundcloud.com/carlos-pazuzu)
